thread.title: Picasso, Monet from William Koch collection to be auctioned
thread.title_full: Picasso, Monet from William Koch collection to be auctioned

title: Picasso, Monet from William Koch collection to be auctioned
text:
> Entertainment Picasso, Monet from William Koch collection to be auctioned This photo provided by Sotheby's shows a 1908 painting, Water Lilies, by French Impressionist Claude Monet. The painting, from the William I. Koch collection, will be auctioned Nov. 5, 2015. (Sotheby's via AP) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team!
